pages.text: A lot of knowledge in this world cannot be described using mere words. Sometimes, one has to experience it by themselves. Such $(marked)Occult Knowledge$() is stored in this book once acquired, and is usually used in $(marked)Rites$().

pages.title: A Witches Secret
pages.text: Despite all their madness and debility, $(marked)Witches$() seem to have an extraordinary understanding of the occult outside of Great Old Ones. They will be ready to share their secret after gifting them a potion.$(br)$(o)Try giving them this book!$()

pages.title: Knowledge of Hastur
pages.text: $(marked)Yellow Vassals$() are dedicated worshippers of the Yellow King, and always in for a talk. They may share what they know after building a good reputation among them.
